title: Who do you consider "League's Best Girl?"... i know what it makes me sound like but I'm curious...
body:
(Disclaimer: Call me weeb trash if you want idc. I really dont watch anime save for RWBY, but K)

http://img11.deviantart.net/f222/i/2012/080/4/f/sona_lol_by_kawailemon-d4tjirq.png

Everyone has a "type" so im just curious, what do you perfer, {{champion:254}} , {{champion:103}} , {{champion:18}} , or even {{champion:421}} ?
I'll have a Poll and include more popular picks while keeping it diverse.

____

Overall i'd assume the most generic response would be {{champion:103}} , the cute seductive fox girl probably gets the most attention and she is high up there for me. But overall its {{champion:37}} ... its hard not to find your main the Best ever... 

Yay Favoritism!

---------

I know i might get hate for this but eh, i felt like posting this.

https://media.giphy.com/media/SWjCswum5dc0E/giphy.gif

EDIT: REMINDER- - THERES ONLY 10 SPOTS, I COULDNT FIT EVERYONE!

replies.body: {{champion:99}} The fact that the 2nd brightest champ in the game isn't on here is heresy.
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/706/062/9ac.jpg
We're going to fight.

Sorry, but it was that laugh... that laugh kept her off the poll...

http://i.imgur.com/WZAawn7.gif?noredirect

*shivers*
The laugh is psychological warfare in itself.

SonaKaiser ships aside, I'm a sucker for punk girls even though Metal and Punk have this really serious rivalry going on.
That's why I started picking up {{champion:254}}  whenever I jungle.
she was close to making it on the poll, SO MANY FEMALES... it was hard to chose especially trying hard to put aside personal biases... i failed mostely on that party i feel XD
Nah, there aren't just a lot of people that are into tomboyish girls^^

tomboyish girls ARE the best.

and the only thing better than tomboyish girls is gamer tomboyish girls!
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-58290-stop-my-penis-can-only-get-so-awjF.gif
you'd be surprised actually.
I'm honestly surprised Tristana was on the list over Caitlyn, I mean I've heard that a lot of guys dig British babes.

As someone studying English; YES
British accents are so very lovely ^w^

I'm a sucker for girls with red hair...and my girl friend looks just like ironscale Shyvana.

I've always preferred {{champion:37}}, even though I don't play bot lane. She just seems really innocent, kind, charming, cute, and, let's be honest here, boobs. Also DJ Sona's booty.

Plus she's mute so she can't talk back xD

> She just seems really innocent, kind, charming, cute, and, let's be honest here, boobs. Also DJ Sona's booty.

Me: Innocent thoughts! Innocent thoughts!
